scalar:array.comment: /** * Swift Mailer File Stream Wrapper * Please read the LICENSE file * @copyright Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> * @package Swift * @license GNU Lesser General Public License */
/** * Swift File stream abstraction layer * Reads bytes from a file * @package Swift * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
/** * The accessible path to the file * @var string */
/** * The name of the file * @var string */
/** * The resource returned by fopen() against the path * @var resource */
/** * The status of magic_quotes in php.ini * @var boolean */
/** * Constructor * @param string The path the the file * @throws Swift_FileException If the file cannot be found */
/** * Set the path to the file * @param string The path to the file * @throws Swift_FileException If the file cannot be found */
/** * Get the path to the file * @return string */
/** * Get the name of the file without it's full path * @return string */
/** * Establish an open file handle on the file if the file is not yet opened * @throws Swift_FileException If the file cannot be opened for reading */

subNode:value.scalar:string: for reading. Check the file permissions.

scalar:array.comment: /** * Check if the pointer as at the end of the file * @return boolean * @throws Swift_FileException If the file cannot be read */
/** * Get a single byte from the file * Returns false past EOF * @return string * @throws Swift_FileException If the file cannot be read */
/** * Read one full line from the file including the line ending * Returns false past EOF * @return string * @throws Swift_FileException If the file cannot be read */
/** * Get the entire file contents as a string * @return string * @throws Swift_FileException If the file cannot be read */
/** * Read a given number of bytes from the file * Returns false past EOF * @return string * @throws Swift_FileException If the file cannot be read */
/** * Get the size of the file in bytes * @return int */
/** * Close the open handle on the file * @throws Swift_FileException If the file cannot be read */
/** * Destructor * Closes the file */
/** * Swift File stream abstraction layer * Reads bytes from a file * @package Swift * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
